title: The Bloody Beetroots Discography - All Vinyl + bootleg albums +
description:
This is my Bloody Beetroots Discography.

It has every original production, vinyl remix, unofficial remix, mix, and bootleg albums of their productions to date (25/02/09)

The Bloody Beetroots have made many many remixes, but not all have been put on a physical release, such as a CD Single or Vinyl, so I have tried to group these tunes as best I could.




Enjoy!







Here is the track list according to itunes:
